issue.title: [C++] Arrow Compute Group By Support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7165](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7165). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure if there is any plan to support groupby in arrow?

Here is some to do in my mind:
1. To make current arrow/compute/kernels/hash supporting received a memo_table as input, so multiple array will be able to get dictencode and valuecount based on same hashmap with a unified index.
1. To add a split array function instead of using take multiple time to split one array to several ones.
1. so the output array can use current funcs under compute/kernels, such as sum/count/sort to support group by.
   
   But this is some of my basic idea, wanna know if there is a on going plan on this?
